name: Underworld Adventures
description:
Underworld Adventures is an excellent 2D adventure game, with RPG elements, in which you need to destroy an ancient evil and free your country from terrible monsters.

The main character needs to free his country from an ancient evil that has awakened from a long hibernation. The hero will have to look for keys in the dungeons to open the main path to the most important rival, but it will be a difficult path because aggressive monsters will come across on our way, which we will have to destroy, and in this we will be helped by items found in the dungeon or new equipment that can be bought from a merchant.
Key Features :

-Two game classes

- 12 dungeon levels to clear.

- a variety of enemies
